title: Ryotaro Ishida
text:
is a Japanese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Ishida was born in <a href="Kanagawa%20Prefecture">Kanagawa Prefecture</a> on December 13, 2001. He joined <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club <a href="Nagoya%20Grampus">Nagoya Grampus</a> from youth team in 2018. On August 22, he debuted against <a href="Sanfrecce%20Hiroshima">Sanfrecce Hiroshima</a> in <a href="2018%20Emperor%27s%20Cup">Emperor's Cup</a>.
